summary: App that displays cycling quotes/wisdom. Working on fixing intermittent mobile loading issues with quotes.
architectural_notes: Quotes/wisdom content should auto-retry on load failure instead of showing error state
known_issues: Intermittent quote loading failure on mobile showing 'wisdom got lost in thought' error

existing_features.title: Update the `useGetQuotes` hook to automatically retry fetching quotes when the request fails, using React Query's retry configuration with multiple retry attempts and exponential backoff, so that intermittent mobile loading failures resolve without user intervention.

In `QuotesPage.tsx`, when an error occurs while retrying, keep showing the loading skeleton state instead of immediately switching to the error UI, so the user on mobile sees a loading experience rather than an error screen during transient failures.

projectName: Auto-retry quote loading on mobile failure
